name: Mahjong Taikai II
overview: Mahjong Taikai II ("Mahjong Tournament II") is a Koei mahjong game and the sequel to Super Mahjong Taikai. Like its predecessor, it features multiple historical figures to compete against in four-person mahjong games. The game features multiple modes and comedic skits with its two hosts. Koei produced numerous Mahjong Taikai games for various systems, playing with their reputation for producing historical strategic simulation games to mash together several famous historical figures from various eras.
